var accessLevelsList = accessLevels.split(','); var singleOwnerRecords = []; var lowAccessLevelRecords = []; var needApproval = false; for (var i = 0; i < accessLevelsList.length; i++) { needApproval = false; var accessLevelGr = new GlideRecordSecure('x_aleen_alertsnowp_access_levels'); if (accessLevelGr.get(accessLevelsList[i])) { var count = 0; var gr = new GlideAggregate('x_aleen_alertsnowp_area_owners'); gr.addQuery('access_level_id', accessLevelGr.access_level_id); gr.addAggregate('COUNT'); gr.query(); while (gr.next()) { count = gr.getAggregate('COUNT'); } if (count == 0) { if (accessLevelGr.criticality == "LOW") { if (lowAccessLevelRecords.length > 0) { lowAccessLevelRecords[0]['access_level_id'] = lowAccessLevelRecords[0]['access_level_id'] + "," + accessLevelGr.access_level_id; lowAccessLevelRecords[0]['access_level_name'] = lowAccessLevelRecords[0]['access_level_name'] + "," + accessLevelGr.access_level_name; lowAccessLevelRecords[0]['sourceid'] = lowAccessLevelRecords[0]['sourceid'] + "###" + accessLevelGr.sourceid; } else { var lmap = {}; lmap['access_level_id'] = accessLevelGr.access_level_id; lmap['access_level_name'] = accessLevelGr.access_level_name; lmap['sourceid'] = accessLevelGr.sourceid; lowAccessLevelRecords.push(lmap); } } else { needApproval = true; foundIndex = -1; for (var icv = 0; icv < singleOwnerRecords.length; icv++) { if (singleOwnerRecords[icv]['approver'] === "DEFAULT") { foundIndex = icv; break; } } if (foundIndex > -1) { singleOwnerRecords[foundIndex]['access_level_id'] = singleOwnerRecords[foundIndex]['access_level_id'] + "," + accessLevelGr.access_level_id; singleOwnerRecords[foundIndex]['access_level_name'] = singleOwnerRecords[foundIndex]['access_level_name'] + "," + accessLevelGr.access_level_name; singleOwnerRecords[foundIndex]['sourceid'] = singleOwnerRecords[foundIndex]['sourceid'] + "###" + accessLevelGr.sourceid; } else { var mapa = {}; mapa['approver'] = "DEFAULT"; mapa['access_level_id'] = accessLevelGr.access_level_id; mapa['access_level_name'] = accessLevelGr.access_level_name; mapa['sourceid'] = accessLevelGr.sourceid; singleOwnerRecords.push(mapa); } } } else { needApproval = true; } if (count == 1) { var grAO = new GlideRecordSecure('x_aleen_alertsnowp_area_owners'); grAO.addQuery('access_level_id', accessLevelGr.access_level_id); grAO.query(); while (grAO.next()) { var refSysUser = grAO.owner.getRefRecord(); var approverID = refSysUser.sys_id; indexFound = -1; for (var icx = 0; icx < singleOwnerRecords.length; icx++) { var mmpa = singleOwnerRecords[icx]; if (mmpa['approver'] == approverID) { indexFound = icx; break; } } if (indexFound > -1) { singleOwnerRecords[indexFound]['access_level_id'] = singleOwnerRecords[indexFound]['access_level_id'] + "," + accessLevelGr.access_level_id; singleOwnerRecords.push(map); } } } if (count > 1) { var buildingAccessTask = new GlideRecordSecure('x_aleen_alertsnowp_building_access_task'); buildingAccessTask.access_level_id = accessLevelGr.access_level_id;
